divs: sighting detailsat around 11pm, i was sitting out on my apartment patio smoking a cigarette, when i noticed a blue-white flash out of the corner of my eye towards the northwest. i stood up and stared in the direction that the flash came from for about 1 minute or so, then i saw another blue-white flash that looked like it was coming from a star-like object. i continued to focus my eyes directly where i witnessed the two flashes. another couple of minutes went by when i noticed a dimly-lit, star-like object appear and begin to slowly descend towards the horizon. all the while there were maybe two or three commercial planes and\or jets in the sky to reference to the anamoly. the object slowly descended out of view behind the apartment building across and to the side of my patio.
Summary: Noticed a blue-white flash in the Northwest out of the corner of my eye, upon looking I noticed another blue-white flash and then the object dimly lit up and began to descent lower to the horizon.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Canton
There were no other sightings in Canton on or around September 21st 2011
